name: iridescent dream
description:
Made in a week for Brackeys Jam 2020.2!

edit: after the deadline I realized the web build broke the game , despite everything working in Unity :/

(will fix it after)

...

Iridescent dream:

A carnival where time flows strangely, and a camera stuck on rewind...

A girl travels backwards in time, to the heart of her memories. Talk to ghosts and explore a surreal carnival of dreams.

...

This was my first attempt at a game jam, and gosh I really ran out of time... I didn't even have time to add in the audio, oops. 

All the art/code were made from scratch for this jam

...

Controls:

- arrow keys to move

- press any key to proceed with dialogue

- if the game breaks (which it probably will) click the rewind button at the bottom right corner, this will restart you at the last checkpoint
